vsParam:
Sure. This is all the luggage and nothing is left behind.
Let's hit the road!

Uh? Hey~ Escha!
Where are you headed?

Ah, Peppermint! And you guys! I'm going to
investigate the peripheral region of the Academy.

Investigate?
Is there any place that concerns you?

Er, not exactly.
Although I get to use alchemy at will here...

I'm afraid that I'll forget what a development team does,
so this investigation can be counted as a practice...
So your work is mainly investigation?
Correct, that's within the scope of work of the development team!

I work for the Development Team, under the Colseit's Branch of the
Unentered Area Special Investigation Bureau.

Uh, Colseit is a small
and remote town in my world...

We work to help improve the living environments of the
local residents, and investigate surrounding territories and ruins.

Oh. That's why it's called the "development team", huh?
It sounds like a tiring but meaningful job, right?

Right, you are going to practice, huh?
Can we go with you and assist with your investigation?

That's a good idea. I'm quite interested, actually!
We can be your guides. Can we go with you?

Really? Thank you so much!
Okay~ I am going to investigate carefully!

Ah... That's apples!?
Bressisle also has apples!

Hehe, look how excited you are.
This Albus region is famous for delicious apples!

I see!
Apple is also the specialty of Colseit.

Er~ This sweet flavor...
It reminds me of apples in Colseit.

Yeah. I need to record this!
"Albus is a region known for its apples"...

... I'm done.
Well, let's go to the next place!

This is where many cultural relics were unearthed.
We excavated many relics related to ancient civilizations.

Ancient civilizations! Wow~ Only hearing about it
makes me inclined to dig here!
Wow, Escha is being more like Anise!

Hee hee. Investigating ruins and relics is the most important
part of the development team's work...

I see. So what your development team does resembles
our study in relicology.

As a discipline centered on relics, relicology is about telling a fuller
story and uncovering the truth by studying everything in the world...
Does the development team have similar goals?

Yes! The ultimate goal of our development team... the
Colseit branch is to investigate the "Unexplored Ruin"!

"Unexplored Ruin"! The name itself makes
people excited! What kind of ruin is it?

That's a ruin located in the suburbs of Colseit,
and it floats in the air in its entirety.

Yes. Since no one has ever arrived there,
it is called the Unexplored Ruin.
Do you have many such ruins?

Er... I don't think so.
But it's magical for something to float in the air, isn't it!

Right!
I've long been yearning for that place!

To realize this dream,
I will study alchemy very hard!

It's really a beautiful dream!
A ruin floating in the air... I want to see it too!

Yeah. That's so fascinating!
Is there a way for us to go to Escha's world...

Ha ha!
Calm down, you are overexcited, Anise!

Hmm, sorry... But I think it's really great for Escha to
work hard towards her dream.

Yeah, of course!
We will all support you!

Thank you!
Well, I must work even harder!
